attributes.action: enable free digital access to Ordnance Survey map data collected using public money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ordnance Survey uses public funds to provide nationwide geographical maps. Any private institution, public body or ordinary member of the public has to then pay a high price to use this information and to obey draconian restrictions on use.  I believe that this situation is detremental to innovation and efficiency in many industries and to academic projects and that such information should be provided as a free public service. I believe the most that could be justifiably charged is the publishing cost of paper-based products and that digital downloads should be freely available.
